Plot: Emma left Russia to live with her husband in Italy. Now a member of a powerful industrial family, she is the respected mother of three, but feels unfulfilled. One day, Antonio, a talented chef and her son's friend, makes her senses kindle.
Title: I Am Love
Writer: Barbara Alberti (screenplay), Ivan Cotroneo (screenplay), Walter Fasano (screenplay), Luca Guadagnino (screenplay), Luca Guadagnino (story)
Actors: Tilda Swinton, Flavio Parenti, Edoardo Gabbriellini, Alba Rohrwacher
tomatoConsensus: It stumbles into melodrama, but I Am Love backs up its flamboyance with tremendous visual style and a marvelous central performance from Tilda Swinton.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 34 nominations.
